short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize candidate experiences on LinkedIn and Github!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Recruiters use CrunchProfile to eliminate research work while sourcing! With CrunchProfile, you can easily see at what growth stage a candidate worked at each company on their profile and what the company does. Say goodbye to opening up a million Crunchbase tabs :) We also let you summarize what a candidate's expertise and contact info are on their Github profile!
